positions.subtitle: Mastercard
positions.description: - Developed go-to-market strategies for merchant offers across various card products.- Led initiatives to increase contactless payment adoption, impacting cardholder behavior and driving significant revenue growth.- Analyzed cardholder behavior data to identify key industry trends and opportunities, generating millions in revenue.- Expertise in identifying opportunities, analyzing costs and revenues, and implementing data-driven strategies.

positions.subtitle: Mastercard
positions.description: • Building robust system on identifying features that significantly impact the spend behavior on credit and debit cards. projects: [{"title":"Predictive Modelling for Calculation of Slab Reheating time for Hot Rolling of Stainless Steel","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jul 2018","description":"Analyzed the working of slab re-heating furnace and developed new features that affected total reheating time by 6%. Applied ensemble models to predict the total residence time of each slab inside the re-heating furnace, created a sequence of steel grades with least residence time.Created an interactive user interface using Shiny-R to load the data and get the required time for reheating"},{"title":"Reinforced Navigation System","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"May 2018","description":"Developed a navigation system using reinforcement learning to find the shortest path in real-time by applying the gaussian fuzzy function to vectorize the sensors input and used it to find the optimized path. Created a dynamic simulation environment to train on the model developed using kivy platformand enhanced the model utilizing Q-Learning to map situation-action pairs into action to obtain the final optimized path"},{"title":"Forecasting Accidents In Industry by Time Series Analysis","start_date":"May 2017","end_date":"Jul 2017","description":"Analysed the time dependencies of accidents in the steel industry and performed univariate analysis of data and used models like ARIMA and neural networks to forecast the future possibilities of these accidents. Improved the forecasting methods by lowering the training time by implementing ELM network model"}]

honors_and_awards.title: National Talent Search Examintion (NTSE)
honors_and_awards.description: National Talent Search Examination is a national-level scholarship program in India to identify and recognize students with high intellect and academic talent. It is one of the most prestigious exams in India awarded only to 1000 students with a scholarship of Rs 240000 per annum.

honors_and_awards.title: ZS Young Data Science Challenge 2018 | Top 20
honors_and_awards.description: Adjudged among the top 20 participants from over 5000 participants across India in a 65 hours duration challenge. Forecasted the sales using Elman and Random Forest models obtaining SMAPE of 21%
